topics.body:
Man naming characters is hard
If you give them normal names, it can just be boring
But if you try to hard making up a name, it can just sound stupid

topics.body:
Lucky Star ep5 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]short people problems 

Blue Hawaii flavor... it tastes like Blue Hawaii don'tcha know 

"BALSAMIC VINEGAR" 

I knew she was going to talk into the fan as soon as i saw it XD 

Nobody can ever resist talking into the fan. Fact of life. 

"BALSAMIC VINEGAR" 

Accurate description of homework courtesy of Yui 

I AM CALM 

Oh finally a karaoke ED song I know >_> but oh god my ears
!http://i.imgur.com/46xrN9M.gif![/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Slow episode this time around, not a lot of stuff for me to talk about, still not bad though
